articles.title: As it happened: ASX sheds 1.1% with Georgia hanging in the balance - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket finished 1.1% lower on Wednesday at 6607.1 as the Georgia senate run-off - and control of the US Senate - was hanging in the balance.
